platform.summary: RNA structure and design tools including RNA2D3D and StructureLab
comments: Features tools from the Shapiro Lab at NCI.
citations: Sharan, R., Bindewald, E., Kasprzak, W., & Shapiro, B. (2017). [Computational Generation of RNA Nanorings](https://doi.org/10.1007/978-1-4939-7138-1_2). In E. Bindewald & B. A. Shapiro (Eds.), RNA Nanostructures (pp. 19â€“32). doi: 10.1007/978-1-4939-7138-1_2
